meanings.sent1: My colorblind friend sometimes mixes up red and green.
meanings.sent2: She has a colorblind brother who struggles with traffic lights.
meanings.sent3: The colorblind artist accidentally painted the sky purple instead of blue.
meanings.sent4: His colorblind vision turned the world into a confusing rainbow of shades.
meanings.sent5: Being colorblind can make everyday tasks like choosing ripe fruit challenging.

meanings.definition: A person who is unable to see certain colors.
meanings.sent1: The colorblind in our class always asks for help with color-coded assignments.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a colorblind and relies on others to match his clothes.
meanings.sent3: The colorblind at the art exhibit admired the sculptures for their shapes rather than hues.
meanings.sent4: As a colorblind, he sees the world in a unique and fascinating way.
meanings.sent5: The colorblind's world is like a black-and-white movie with occasional pops of color.
